resources.string: You need to open an account in the UK with any bank for allowance and clain to reimbursement.
Opening your bank account in UK
It is simple to open an account at the nearest and preffered bank once you are in UK
Fill up the details and e-mail the template back to Helpdesk, who will issue you a TCS cover letter.
Arrange an appointment with the bank and visit them at the scheduled time with required documents.

Please note that you will be required to provide a UK address and contact number. In case you haven\'t finalised accomodation, you may provide your manager\'s/colleague\'s details and change this at a later date.
Note: As per the credit brokerage & licensing act, employers in UK are not allowed to influence or advice associates of any recommended banks for them to open a bank account.
Destination Onsite is a one step solution to all your queries related to Visa processes, mandates and documentation.
